long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension enables you to toggle a grid overlay for the Base Layers CSS framework.

Click the Base Layers icon beside the Chrome address bar to toggle a grid on websites using the Base Layers grid.
